column4: Hey, is it me or is firefox-3.5 weirdly branded with a different name, and doesn't overwrite the original firefox?
so it is
not without formating
if I got the DVD would it just work without asking?
encrytion ?
use alternate installer
that was the minimal installer then, alterante doesn't require inet and cd is good, too
it was a 715 mb installer
if it was th e alternate, can easy do this, else expert-mode works, too, but more hassle
I'm just going to assume for some reason the universal linux to USB key thing screwed it up and installed minimal from the alternate ISO
nah, but you have to tell gparted how to handle the disk
I used the windows/linux universal boot creator I forget the name.. used it in windows
easiest way use alternate cd , but usb from that should also work
I did but it didn't work properly..
anyway, I'm going to do a proper reinstall on wed probably..  Glad to know that alternate itself isn't bad though.

this is vague..
er, unetbootin or usb-creator I guess?
usb-creator does fine, but why not use the cd itself ?
defective dvd drive on my laptop
yeah if my dvd drive was fine I would have burned alternate and be done already
unetbootin is pretty impressive I find..
